features: 【Easy to Use and See】This phone has a 2.4" HD main display that shows big font and big icon for easy viewing. You can see everything clearly on the screen, even in bright sunlight or from different angles. The phone also has big buttons with backlit and talking number feature, so you can easily dial the numbers you want, even in low light or without glasses.

【Multifunctional and Practical】This phone is not only a phone, but also a handy tool for your daily life. It has a flashlight that you can use in the dark or in emergencies. It also has an FM radio that lets you listen to your favorite stations and music without using any data. The phone also has other useful functions such as photo speed dial, tasks, audio player, Bluetooth, alarm, calculator, and calendar. You can access these functions with just a few clicks.

【4G Flip Phone】This phone is compatible with 4G Nano SIM cards from T-Mobile, MetroPCS, SpeedTalk, Tello and RedPocket GSMT. It supports 4G bands, so you can enjoy fast and reliable connection wherever you go. Please note that this phone is NOT compatible with AT&T, Cricket or any CDMA networks like Verizon, Sprint, and Boost Mobile.

【Safe and Convenient】This phone is specially designed for seniors and kids who want a simple and practical phone. It has an SOS function that allows you to set up to five emergency contacts. If you need help, just press the SOS button and the phone will ring loudly and dial the contacts one by one until someone answers. This can be a lifesaver in case of an emergency. The phone also comes with a cradle charger that makes charging easy and hassle-free.

【Stylish and Durable】This phone has a stylish and durable design that suits any occasion. It has a sleek silver color that looks elegant and professional. It also has a sturdy flip cover that protects the screen and keypad from scratches and dust. The phone is made of high-quality materials that can withstand drops and shocks. The phone is also lightweight and compact, so you can easily carry it in your pocket or purse.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: artfone makes mobile phones like art Do you love mobile phones that are easy to use, reliable, and affordable? Do you appreciate mobile phones that have elegant designs, powerful functions, and reasonable prices? Do you enjoy mobile phones that combine art and practicality? If you answered yes to any of these questions, then you will love artfone, a brand that makes electronics like art accessible to everyone. Unlocked to T-Mobile, MetroPCS, SpeedTalk, Tello and RedPocket GSMT SIM Card.Please note that this phone is NOT compatible with AT&T, Cricket or with any CDMA Networks like Verizon, Sprint, and Boost Mobile.

Enjoy two ways of charging your phone: with the USB-C cable or with the dock charger The USB-C cable allows you to charge your phone from any compatible device, such as a laptop or a power bank. The dock charger lets you charge your phone without any cables, just by placing it on its stand. Experience high-quality signal and stable calls with the MTK chipset This phone uses a powerful and reliable chipset that ensures your phone has a strong and consistent signal, no matter where you are. You can make and receive calls without any interruptions or dropped calls. See everything clearly on the bright and colorful screen The phone has a 2.4-inch QVGA screen that displays vivid and sharp images. The screen brightness is 20% higher than other brands, so you can see everything clearly even in sunlight or low light. You can also adjust the font size and contrast to suit your preferences and eyesight. Stay safe and comfortable with the special features for seniors This phone has a SOS button on the back that allows you to call for help in case of an emergency. You can set up to five contacts that will be dialed automatically when you press the button. The phone also has a torch switch on the side that lets you turn on the flashlight with one touch. You can also use the volume buttons on the side to adjust the sound level easily.

Keep your phone running for days with the long-lasting battery The phone has a 1000mAh real capacity battery that can last for up to 300 hours on standby mode or up to 240 minutes of talk time. You don’t have to worry about running out of power when you need it most. Hear every word clearly with the loud and clear speaker This phone has a 2618 enhanced version loudspeaker that delivers crisp and clear sound. The speaker volume is adjustable and can be very loud if needed. You can hear every word clearly, even in noisy environments or if you have hearing problems. The phone also supports hands-free mode, so you can talk without holding the phone to your ear. Enjoy the durability and quality of the flip design The phone has a classic flip design that protects the screen and keypad from scratches and dust. The phone also has a sturdy hinge that can withstand up to 100,000 times of opening and closing. You can enjoy using this phone for a long time without any worries about its quality or performance. Store more photos, music, and files with the large memory and SD card support This phone has a 128MB+64MB memory that allows you to store up to 1000 phone books. You can also expand the memory with a SD card up to 32GB (not included). You can store more photos, music, videos, and files on your phone and access them anytime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Phone for Seniors
reviews.reviewText: This phone was very much appreciated by my husband for whom it was purchased. It is small, does everything he wants it to do and he likes the larger buttos as he is visually impaired.

reviews.reviewTitle: Battery didn't last for 10 min new now only works when charging
reviews.reviewText: Bought this phone for my daughter to use to replace a smart phone. Very poor quality out of the box, my daughter complained the phone charge would only last 10 min before dying and I thought she was just sour grapes about having to replace her smart phone. Finally got around to looking at it myself and the phone says it is charged but does not function unless plugged in. Past the return window at this point so I'm out the cash, I'll let you know if the seller reaches out to offer a replacement. Perhaps it's a defective battery or maybe they are all junky?

reviews.reviewTitle: It is good for older people that don't really like cell phones.
reviews.reviewText: So far I like it but it is a bit early to do a full review. I am slowly getting used to it. The only thing so far that is difficult is the texting. Having to choose one of three letters each time is a bit much. As I don't use text a lot and don't intend to I will live with it. So far it is good value for the price.

As a older gentleman that only has the need to communicate this phone is a good choice. It’s cheap by price and understandably so. It’s plastic and very easy to break or scratched if handled roughly. This said, it has all the functions needed and is made in a way that’s it’s readable and easy to set.It’s fast on the recharge , and compatable with all the functions needed to call, and text.Just be aware that it’s fragile, and does the work.Ty
bout this cell phone january 6 stop working on febuary the 5 cheap product dont recomend it to no onenews from amazon refund ,,,a received 22.60$refund when i paid 79.09 $ ,,,what a joke

I bought this for my mother who in 92. Even though it is sold as a phone for seniors she is incapable of figuring out how to retrieve voice mails or messages with it. Even after my showing here many times there are just too many steps for a mind that is memory challenged. Build quality is fair and it should be larger in size for seniors fumbling hands. We hooked her up with Bell which has the closes cell tower but reception seems to go in and out a lot ranging from no reception to 4 bars. My phone is with a discount carrier and I only get 1 bar in her house but it's far more stable than her artphone. I can't really recommend this phone for seniors.
